g++   -fPIC -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -fvisibility=hidden -DNDEBUG    -O3 -Wstrict-aliasing=0 -ffast-math    CMakeFiles/test00.dir/test00.o CMakeFiles/test00.dir/test00_device.o  -o ../../test00 -rdynamic ../../libembree.so.2.3.1 -lOpenCL ../../libtutorial.a ../../libimage.a ../../libtransport.a ../../libtutorial_device.a ../../libembree_sse41.a ../../libembree_sse42.a ../../libembree_avx.a ../../libembree_avx2.a ../../libsimd.a ../../liblexers.a -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lglut -lXmu -lXi -ljpeg ../../libsys.a -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/gyz/code/work/embree-cl
